desc.cn: Libfido2提供库功能和命令行工具，用于通过 USB 或 NFC 与 FIDO 设备通信，并验证证明和断言签名
desc.en: libfido2 provides library functionality and command-line tools to communicate with a FIDO device over USB or NFC, and to verify attestation and assertion signatures

ubuntu/apt.cmd: sudo apt install libfido2-1 libfido2-dev libfido2-doc fido2-tools

fedora/dnf.cmd: sudo dnf install libfido2 libfido2-devel fido2-tools
